import React from "react"; import { fetchCart } from "../../JS/actions/product"; import {connect} from 'react-redux' function OrderSummary(props) { useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { try { await props.fetchCart(props.user.id); } catch (error) { } fetchData(); } }, []) return (

); } const mapStateToProps = (state)=>({ user : state.account.user, cart : state.product.cart, }) export default connect (mapStateToProps,{fetchCart})(OrderSummary);
